Grants for Guitars
  • £1,000 Award
  • Easy 2 days
  • 01.01.2015 Deadline

- read more -
What is it?

One of Britain's biggest music retailers is offering grants of up to £5,000 for schools who need new guitars in order to offer lessons to their disadvantaged pupils

Who is Eligible?

All schools throughout the UK and Northern Ireland

What Will I Get?

Up to £5,000 to spend on new classical, acoustic and electric guitars

What Next?

Go to the website to download an application pack
